mapper.select: SELECT CUST_CD, (SELECT * FROM GET_CODE_NAME('1008',CUST_CD) p) as CUST_CDNM, CUST_NO, CUST_NM, TEL1_NO, TEL2_NO, TEL3_NO, FAX_NO, ADDR, EMAILID, CUST_NOTE FROM TCUSTOMER where CUST_NO = #{custNo}
SELECT p.V_OUT_VALUE As existCode FROM GET_TCUSTOMER_EXIST(#{custCd}, #{custNo}, #{custNm}, #{tel1No}, #{tel2No}, #{tel3No}) p
SELECT count(*) as existCnt FROM TCUSTOMER WHERE CUST_NO = #{custNo} AND CUST_CD = '1002'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TCUSTOMER (CUST_CD, CUST_NO, CUST_NM, TEL1_NO, TEL2_NO, TEL3_NO, EMAILID, FAX_NO, ADDR, CUST_NOTE, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{custCd}, GEN_ID(SEQ_CUST_NO,1) , #{custNm}, #{tel1No}, #{tel2No}, #{tel3No}, #{emailId}, #{faxNo}, #{addr}, #{custNote},(SELECT p.RET_VALUE FROM GET_CHAR_DATE(0) p))

INSERT INTO TCUSTOMER (CUST_CD, CUST_NO, CUST_NM, TEL1_NO, TEL2_NO, TEL3_NO, EMAILID, FAX_NO, ADDR, CUST_NOTE, REG_DATE) VALUES (#{custCd},#{custNo}, #{custNm}, #{tel1No}, #{tel2No}, #{tel3No}, #{emailId}, #{faxNo}, #{addr}, #{custNote},(SELECT p.RET_VALUE FROM GET_CHAR_DATE(0) p))
mapper.update: UPDATE TCUSTOMER SET ADDR = #{addr}, TEL2_NO = #{tel2No}, TEL3_NO = #{tel3No}, EMAILID = #{emailId}, CUST_NOTE = #{custNote}, CUST_NM = #{custNm} WHERE CUST_NO = #{custNo}
mapper.select: SELECT FIRST 2000 CUST_CD, (SELECT * FROM GET_CODE_NAME('1008',CUST_CD) p) as CUST_CDNM, CUST_NO, CUST_NM, TEL1_NO, TEL2_NO, TEL3_NO, FAX_NO, ADDR, EMAILID, CUST_NOTE FROM TCUSTOMER where 1=1
